text: Walter McQueen Stephenson (March 27, 1911 in Saluda, North Carolina – July 4, 1993 in Shreveport, Louisiana), nicknamed "Tarzen", was a professional baseball player who played catcher in the Major Leagues from 1935 to 1937. He played for the Chicago Cubs and Philadelphia Phillies. ==External links== Category:1911 births Category:1993 deaths Category:Major League Baseball catchers Category:Chicago Cubs players Category:Philadelphia Phillies players Category:High Point Pointers players Category:Knoxville Smokies players Category:Lafayette White Sox players Category:Los Angeles Angels (minor league) players Category:Montreal Royals players Category:Mount Airy Graniteers players Category:Oklahoma City Indians players Category:Shreveport Sports players Category:Winston-Salem Twins players Category:Baseball players from North Carolina Category:People from Saluda, North Carolina
title: Walter Stephenson
